effects.description: Target is Blinded for 1 round + 1 round per additional success
Dispel one effect applied on the target. For every 3 additional successes spent, dispel one more effect. Target can make a RES save to ignore all but the first dispel.
Permanently destroy a sensory organ on the head, or otherwise maim the head
Target’s next attack provokes Attacks of Opportunity
Target loses 1 AP + 1 AP per 3 additional successes spent. This can reduce the target’s AP below 0
Sever or otherwise maim the arm
Hobbled for 1 round + 1 round per additional success
Sever or otherwise maim the leg
Attack applies with Sundering to the item
Be disarmed. Item is moved 1m per additional success spent
Weakpoint attacks requires 2 less successes to Critical (minimum 1)
